using namespace std;
#define gc getchar_unlocked
void scanint(int &x)
{
register int c = gc();
x = 0;
for(;(c<48 || c>57);c = gc());
for(;c>47 && c<58;c = gc()) {x = (x<<1) + (x<<3) + c - 48;}
}
int main()
{
int t,r,c;
long long sum;
scanint(t);
while(t--)
{
sum=0;
scanint(r);
scanint(c);
if(c>2&&c&1)
sum+=(c-3)/2+2;
else if(c==2)
sum+=2;
else if(c>2&&!(c&1))
sum+=(c-3)/2+3;
else
sum+=1;
if(r&1)
sum+=(r-1)/2;
else
sum+=(r)/2;
if(r==0||c==0)
sum=0;
cout<<sum<<"\n";
}
return 0;
}
